scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix ./Packages/TranslatorJson && npm install --prefix ./Packages/TranslatorJsonGodeTing
scripts.start: concurrently --names "Cphbusiness","Gode ting  " --prefix-colors cyan,yellow "npm run startTranslatorJson" "npm run startTranslatorJsonGodeTing"
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Cphbusiness","Gode ting  " --prefix-colors cyan,yellow "npm run devTranslatorJson" "npm run devTranslatorJsonGodeTing"
